trans-unit.source: Renders ink on a surface.
Ink rendering occurs in two ways: dynamic and static.
Dynamic rendering occurs as ink is written to an inking surface: the stroke is rendered as it is being collected.
Static rendering occurs after stroke data is collected and attached to a new stroke.

To render ink dynamically using the InkPresenter, attach the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the InkPresenter by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> method.
To statically render ink, add stroke objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> class.
Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> this element uses to arrange its child content.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element and its child.
Attaches the visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.
Attach the visual of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> to dynamically render ink on your control.
The visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that specifies the appearance of the dynamically rendered ink.
visual is already attached to a visual tree.
Detaches the visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> on a custom control changes, the visual of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> must be re-attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
Call the DetachVisuals and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> methods to re-attach the visual to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
The visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to detach.
visual is not attached to the .

Returns a clipping geometry that indicates the area that will be clipped if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
The available size of the element.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the area that is clipped when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the child element at the specified index position.
Index position of the child element.
The child element at the specified index position.
Measures the child element of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> to prepare for arranging it during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
The target <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the element.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
Gets and sets the strokes that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> displays.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The strokes that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> displays.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a value that is equal to the number of visual child elements of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>.
The number of visual child elements.
